programme.title: Awoken
programme.desc: Apabila tiada apa yang boleh dilakukan untuk pesakit Insomnia Fatal Familial di hospital, seorang pelajar perubatan telah menyuruh abangnya dipindahkan ke kemudahan rahsia di ruang bawah tanah untuk rawatan alternatif.

programme.title: The Presence
programme.desc: Aom dihantui mimpi ngeri yang tidak dapat dijelaskan. Semasa melawat neneknya, dia mendapat tahu bahawa neneknya yang kelihatan lebih mati daripada hidup sedang melayan dan memberi makan kepada hantu. Adakah Aom akan menerima nasibnya?

programme.title: Taxi 2
programme.desc: Duta Jepun sedang melawat Marseilles untuk melihat taktik anti-geng polis bandar. Semasa lawatan itu, bagaimanapun, dia diculik oleh kumpulan yang bekerja untuk yakuza Jepun. Pegawai muda Emilien berazam untuk menyelamatkan duta dan pegawai Petra (teman wanitanya), yang turut diculik, dan memulihkan kehormatan jabatannya. Sekali lagi, pemandu teksi syaitan laju Daniel (dari filem Teksi pertama) dipanggil untuk menyelamatkan hari dengan kemahiran memandu lajunya.

programme.title: Losmen Melati Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Di pinggir Jawa, Indonesia, pengembara dari dekat dan jauh meninjau sesuatu yang aneh dan misteri. sebuah keluarga yang mencari tempat tinggal selepas pengebumian nenek mereka dan pasangan muda bercinta mencari tempat untuk bermalam bersama. Walau bagaimanapun, perkara-perkara tidak seperti yang mereka nampak di losmen

programme.title: Black S1 Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Detektif Khairul Malik menyimpan sebuah rahsia, yang teman wanitanya, Aisya tidak tahu mengenainya. Perkara menjadi rumit dengan penemuan mayat dua puluh tahun, yang menggerakkan rangkaian kejadian yang membawa maut. Kehidupannya berubah secara mendadak apabila dia bertemu Sofia, gadis yang berkebolehan meramal kematian orang. Apabila dia meramal sebuah tragedi dahsyat, Sofia mendapat perhatian polis dan juga seorang keturunan usahawan insurans ulung, Lokman Nazir. Tertarik dengan bakat unik Sofia, Malik meyakinkan dia untuk bekerja bersamanya untuk menyelamatkan nyawa, tetapi niat baik mereka menyebabkan tragedi. Sementara itu, penghantaran sebuah pita menyebabkan huru-hara dalam hubungan Malik dan Aisya apabila rahsia gelap Aisya mula terungkai.

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep 10 Ep10
programme.desc: Kereta yang dipandu Maya rosak di jalan sunyi. Kemudian Maya diganggui dengan kewujudan Echa di situ hingga menyebabkan Maya ketabrakan. Dalam waktu yang sama, berlakunya pertembungan ilmu antara Dukun Induk dan Dawami yang sedang merawat Nina atas panggilan Ibu Halim. Dawami berjaya melumpuhkan ilmu Dukun Induk. Nina terus merajuk dan bersikap dingin terhadap Halim. Dawami meneruskan perubatannya terhadap Nina, dikatakan terkena santau dan ilmu sihir yang menyerang seluruh keluarga dan rumahnya

programme.title: Congkak
programme.desc: Kisahnya bermula apabila Kazman serta isterinya Sufiah mengambil keputusan bercuti bersama dua anaknya, Lisa dan Ely di sebuah banglo di tepi tasik. Kazman sudah berjanji dengan seorang kawannya untuk membeli banglo tersebut sebagai persinggahan semasa bercuti. Pelbagai peristiwa pelik berlaku sepanjang perjalan mereka termasuk kehilangan telefon bimbitnya. Setibanya mereka di banglo tersebut, peristiwa yang semakin pelik turut terjadi. Sufiah cuba meyakinkan Kazman untuk keluar dari rumah tersebut tetapi tidak diendahkan. Kazman tetap berkeras untuk membeli rumah tersebut kerana sudah berjanji dengan kawannya. Sufiah sentiasa merasakan ada makhluk sedang memerhatikannya. Salah seorang anak mereka, Lisa setiap malam akan turun ke sebuah bilik gelap untuk bermain congkak dengan seseorang yang hanya boleh dilihat olehnya seorang. Sufiah yang tidak boleh bersabar dengan perkara itu telah membuang congkak tersebut ke dalam tasik. Lisa juga sentiasa bermain di tepi belukar di belakang rumah kerana kawannya tinggal di situ sehingga Kazman perasan Lisa bermain menghadap kubur lama. Pada malam keesokannya, Sufiah dikejutkan lagi dengan bunyi congkak tersebut dari bilik yang sama. Apabila Sufiah pergi melihat, dilihatnya seorang tua sedang bemain congkak tersebut. Semakin lama peristiwa yang berlaku semakin pelik dan menyeramkan sehingga pada malam ketiga kedua-dua anaknya telah hilang dan Sufiah didapati tidur di siling bilik. Pak Tua, penduduk paling lama di kampung itu telah pergi ke rumah tersebut untuk menyelamatkan keluarga Kazman dan mencari Ely dan Lisa. Apakah sejarah sebenar banglo tersebut dan dapatkan Sufiah diselamatkan serta berjayakah Ely dan Lisa ditemui semula.

programme.title: Rahsia
programme.desc: Dihantui gangguan misteri, sepasang suami isteri mula mencari punca kepada gangguan tersebut. Profesor Hamdan dan Ramlah serta anak mereka, Saiful dan Marina berpindah ke sebuah banglo lama di tepi laut. Mereka hidup aman dan damai bersama di banglo tersebut. Namun tragedi melanda apabila Marina lemas di laut dan meninggal dunia - dari situlah bermulanya kejadian aneh.

programme.title: Alahai Kekasihku
programme.desc: Rini seorang wanita berbadan besar yang ingin mengurangkan berat badannya. Namun dia sering gagal untuk berbuat sedemikian kerana dia suka makan. Di pejabat, Rini sering bertikam lidah dengan Norman yang selalu menyakitkan hatinya. Dalam masa yang sama, Rini jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki yang dikenalinya di internet. Apabila mereka bercadang untuk berjumpa buat kali pertama, Rini berusaha dengan lebih giat untuk menjadi kurus.

programme.title: Suratan Kasih
programme.desc: Sunny mengalami tekanan jiwa selepas melihat ibunya yang sedang berzina mati dibunuh ayahnya sendiri. Apabila meningkat dewasa, Sunny menjadi seorang pembunuh bersiri di sebalik kerjayanya sebagai komposer dan pemuzik. Mangsanya ialah golongan perempuan yang melakukan perbuatan zina. Dalam masa yang sama, Sunny mencintai seorang penyanyi baharu yang bernama Natasha.

programme.title: Dendam Pelamin
programme.desc: Hubungan cinta antara Marissa dan Saiful putus seminggu sebelum mereka berkahwin. Ini kerana Saiful tidak mencintai Marissa dan memilih untuk bersama Nani. Sebelum mereka berpisah, Saiful sempat menyonglap wang syarikat sebanyak RM250 ribu dan enggan membayar semula kepada Marissa. Perkara ini menyebabkan Marissa menaruh dendam terhadap Saiful dan Nani dan merancang sesuatu untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Misteri Rumah Tua
programme.desc: Dendam lama mula terbalas apabila hadirnya sekumpulan remaja ke sebuah rumah lama yang dihuni roh wanita. Sebuah pembunuhan kejam telah berlaku di rumah tersebut apabila dia dirogol dan dibunuh ketika sedang sarat mengandung. Wanita tersebut ingin membalas dendam kerana ketidakadilan yang telah berlaku ketika dirinya masih hidup. Bapa kepada salah seorang dari kumpulan remaja tersebut pula pernah terlibat dengan pembunuhan kejam wanita itu yang menaikkan lagi rasa marah roh tersebut. Pelbagai insiden menyeramkan mula terjadi di rumah itu.

programme.title: Nayang
programme.desc: Seorang penulis skrip bernama Eysha sedang mencari bahan untuk menulis kisah misteri yang berlaku di sebuah kampung terpencil bernama Kampung Nayang. Di sana dia bertemu Nek Som yang tahu akan kisah itu. Menurut cerita Nek Som, di kampung itu dahulu tinggal seorang wanita bernama Nayang yang sering diganggu Jalak dan rakan-rakannya ketika suaminya dipenjara akibat difitnah. Ketika itulah berlaku satu tragedi sehingga mengakibatkan kekecohan di seluruh kampung itu.

programme.title: Jengka
programme.desc: Nini mengalami keguguran semasa melarikan diri di ladang kelapa sawit. Namun, satu perkara aneh terjadi apabila bayinya dikatakan masih hidup dan dilarikan oleh penunggu. Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

programme.title: Bapak Borek Anak Rintik
programme.desc: Johan merupakan seorang pemuda yang memiliki kelebihan semulajadi dari segi kepantasan dan tenaga. Johan bertekad untuk mencari ayahnya yang tidak pernah ditemuinya sejak dilahirkan. Dalam pencarian itu Johan telah menyelamatkan Osman yang sedang ditimpa masalah. Johan yakin Osman ialah ayahnya yang dicari cari selama ini. Perkenalan dengan Osman telah melibatkan Johan dalam masalah yang lebih besar. Johan yang lurus bendul itu telah dipergunakan Osman untuk melakukan tugas-tugas mengintip Julia, gadis pisau cukur. Keadaan menjadi lebih huru-hara apabila Johan berkenalan dan dengan Fiza.

programme.title: Rahsia
programme.desc: Dihantui gangguan misteri, sepasang suami isteri mula mencari punca kepada gangguan tersebut. Profesor Hamdan dan Ramlah serta anak mereka, Saiful dan Marina berpindah ke sebuah banglo lama di tepi laut. Mereka hidup aman dan damai bersama di banglo tersebut. Namun tragedi melanda apabila Marina lemas di laut dan meninggal dunia - dari situlah bermulanya kejadian aneh.

programme.title: Aku Bukan Pendatang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sudin yang mendapat tugasan untuk menghantar kereta pejabatnya ke Singapura. Dalam perjalanannya menuju Kota Singa, Sudin bertemu dengan Zaharah dan Mayon di sebuah kawasan rehat dan menumpangkan mereka berdua ke Johor Bahru. Tanpa disedari, Sudin telah kehilangan pasportnya dan dia terperangkap dalam satu sindiket pemalsuan dokumen. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku sehingga Sudin dianggap sebagai pendatang asing tanpa izin.

programme.title: Hantu Siang
programme.desc: Seorang kasanova yang suka menggoda gadis menerima padahnya apabila harus mengahwini mangsanya. Badul telah berjaya mendampingi lebih 17 gadis. Dia mempunyai rancangan untuk menggoda dua lagi gadis baru sebagai mangsanya. Rancangan Badul memakan diri apabila dia sendiri terpaksa menikahi mereka - cubaannya telah memerangkap dirinya sendiri.

programme.title: Dendam Pelamin
programme.desc: Hubungan cinta antara Marissa dan Saiful putus seminggu sebelum mereka berkahwin. Ini kerana Saiful tidak mencintai Marissa dan memilih untuk bersama Nani. Sebelum mereka berpisah, Saiful sempat menyonglap wang syarikat sebanyak RM250 ribu dan enggan membayar semula kepada Marissa. Perkara ini menyebabkan Marissa menaruh dendam terhadap Saiful dan Nani dan merancang sesuatu untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Suratan Kasih
programme.desc: Sunny mengalami tekanan jiwa selepas melihat ibunya yang sedang berzina mati dibunuh ayahnya sendiri. Apabila meningkat dewasa, Sunny menjadi seorang pembunuh bersiri di sebalik kerjayanya sebagai komposer dan pemuzik. Mangsanya ialah golongan perempuan yang melakukan perbuatan zina. Dalam masa yang sama, Sunny mencintai seorang penyanyi baharu yang bernama Natasha.

programme.title: Nayang
programme.desc: Seorang penulis skrip bernama Eysha sedang mencari bahan untuk menulis kisah misteri yang berlaku di sebuah kampung terpencil bernama Kampung Nayang. Di sana dia bertemu Nek Som yang tahu akan kisah itu. Menurut cerita Nek Som, di kampung itu dahulu tinggal seorang wanita bernama Nayang yang sering diganggu Jalak dan rakan-rakannya ketika suaminya dipenjara akibat difitnah. Ketika itulah berlaku satu tragedi sehingga mengakibatkan kekecohan di seluruh kampung itu.

programme.title: Misteri Rumah Tua
programme.desc: Dendam lama mula terbalas apabila hadirnya sekumpulan remaja ke sebuah rumah lama yang dihuni roh wanita. Sebuah pembunuhan kejam telah berlaku di rumah tersebut apabila dia dirogol dan dibunuh ketika sedang sarat mengandung. Wanita tersebut ingin membalas dendam kerana ketidakadilan yang telah berlaku ketika dirinya masih hidup. Bapa kepada salah seorang dari kumpulan remaja tersebut pula pernah terlibat dengan pembunuhan kejam wanita itu yang menaikkan lagi rasa marah roh tersebut. Pelbagai insiden menyeramkan mula terjadi di rumah itu.

programme.title: Alahai Kekasihku
programme.desc: Rini seorang wanita berbadan besar yang ingin mengurangkan berat badannya. Namun dia sering gagal untuk berbuat sedemikian kerana dia suka makan. Di pejabat, Rini sering bertikam lidah dengan Norman yang selalu menyakitkan hatinya. Dalam masa yang sama, Rini jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki yang dikenalinya di internet. Apabila mereka bercadang untuk berjumpa buat kali pertama, Rini berusaha dengan lebih giat untuk menjadi kurus.

programme.title: Jengka
programme.desc: Nini mengalami keguguran semasa melarikan diri di ladang kelapa sawit. Namun, satu perkara aneh terjadi apabila bayinya dikatakan masih hidup dan dilarikan oleh penunggu. Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

programme.title: Bapak Borek Anak Rintik
programme.desc: Johan merupakan seorang pemuda yang memiliki kelebihan semulajadi dari segi kepantasan dan tenaga. Johan bertekad untuk mencari ayahnya yang tidak pernah ditemuinya sejak dilahirkan. Dalam pencarian itu Johan telah menyelamatkan Osman yang sedang ditimpa masalah. Johan yakin Osman ialah ayahnya yang dicari cari selama ini. Perkenalan dengan Osman telah melibatkan Johan dalam masalah yang lebih besar. Johan yang lurus bendul itu telah dipergunakan Osman untuk melakukan tugas-tugas mengintip Julia, gadis pisau cukur. Keadaan menjadi lebih huru-hara apabila Johan berkenalan dan dengan Fiza.

programme.title: Rahsia
programme.desc: Dihantui gangguan misteri, sepasang suami isteri mula mencari punca kepada gangguan tersebut. Profesor Hamdan dan Ramlah serta anak mereka, Saiful dan Marina berpindah ke sebuah banglo lama di tepi laut. Mereka hidup aman dan damai bersama di banglo tersebut. Namun tragedi melanda apabila Marina lemas di laut dan meninggal dunia - dari situlah bermulanya kejadian aneh.

programme.title: Aku Bukan Pendatang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sudin yang mendapat tugasan untuk menghantar kereta pejabatnya ke Singapura. Dalam perjalanannya menuju Kota Singa, Sudin bertemu dengan Zaharah dan Mayon di sebuah kawasan rehat dan menumpangkan mereka berdua ke Johor Bahru. Tanpa disedari, Sudin telah kehilangan pasportnya dan dia terperangkap dalam satu sindiket pemalsuan dokumen. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku sehingga Sudin dianggap sebagai pendatang asing tanpa izin.

programme.desc: TVS mempersembahkan siri dokumentari Rezeki Tanah yang mengisahkan kecekalan 13 orang insan yang sanggup berkotor dan merisikokan diri untuk mencari rezeki, tidak kira daripada hasil hutan mahupun cucuk tanam demi kelangsungan hidup dan keluarga tercinta.

programme.title: Jelu Siga Ep7
programme.desc: Documentary about wildlife and endangered species in Borneo, focusing on habitat, personality, characteristics, public awareness, and various methods to save these species, derived from the Iban language.

programme.title: Kedey Kita S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Orden Syam will use a food truck to visit local entrepreneurs outside Kuching city, such as Sibu, Sarikei, Sri Aman, Kapit, and Betong, helping them promote their businesses and offer exclusive promotions.

programme.title: Kasih Keringkam Ep6
programme.desc: Keringkam mengisahkan pancaroba dua beradik Asmah dan Faridah dalam menjalani hidup bersama ibunya (Sabtuyah) setelah bapanya mati ketika mereka masih kecil lagi.

programme.title: Jaguh Para Sukan Sarawak Ep5
programme.desc: Jaguh Para Sukan Sarawakk is a biographical documentary series that follows the lives of six Sarawakian para-athletes who overcome physical, mental, and psychological challenges to become champions.

programme.title: Roots & Remedies Ep11
programme.desc: ROOTS & REMEDIES is a documentary that delves into Sarawak's traditional medicinal plants and health practices, showcasing their efficacy in treating ailments and daily treatments.

programme.title: Sanggar Vista Ep6
programme.desc: Menjejak rumah-rumah cantik di Sarawak. Keindahan adalah subjektif, maka program ini menampil pelbagai jenis rumah, bukan hanya banglo mewah, tetapi juga rumah tradisional dan sederhana yang dihias indah.

programme.title: Joran Borneo S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Masih mengekalkan konsep Majalah travelog, JORAN BORNEO 2 akan meneruskan ekspedisinya bagi menjejaki lubuk ikan-ikan idaman pemancing di pendalaman dan di hulu BORNEO yang bersempadan Kalimantan.

programme.title: Caves & Caverns Ep2
programme.desc: Our hostess explores Borneo's hidden gems, documenting her experiences, flora, fauna, paragliding, bird watching, and stunning sunsets, ensuring a captivating and exciting adventure.

programme.title: My Journey With Nature Ep2
programme.desc: Pengembaraan seorang wanita ke kawasan pendalaman yang belum diterokai diceritakan dalam "My Journey with Nature", yang menampilkan tarikan pelancongan alam semula jadi.

programme.title: Ninjao S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Ninjao Season 2 follows a group of young explorers on a Sarawak-wide expedition, discovering unique flora and fauna, and showcasing their resilience and appreciation for the region's natural treasures.

programme.title: Agrotech Heroes Ep9
programme.desc: AGROTECH HEROES, aims to nurture future Sarawak farmers by involving six contestants in 13 challenges involving agriculture, technology, and entrepreneurship for the grand prize of RM10,000

programme.title: Agritek S1 Ep13

programme.title: Lifelong Learning S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Lifelong Learning merupakan sebuah rancangan realiti yang membawakan kisah inspirasi serta pengalaman daripada individu yang mempunyai latar belakang yang berbeza.

programme.title: Ready, Set, Go Kids! Ep13

programme.title: Kayoh Kayo Weekend Ep1

Daniel bertambah marah apabila festival filem terpaksa menarik keluar namanya dan memilih Bakri Zain sebagai calon untuk kategori pelakon lelaki terbaik. Sejak dari itu, hasad dengki mula muncul dalam diri Daniel.

programme.title: Senjakala Di Manado
programme.desc: Johny WW Lengkong (Ray Sahetapy), seorang pelaut yang telah meninggalkan keluarganya selama hampir 20 tahun, berniat kembali ke Manado dengan harapan keluarganya mau memaafkannya. Namun ternyata istrinya telah meninggal dunia dan meninggalkan seorang anak bernama Pingkan (Mikha Tambayong). Johny pun berjanji akan merawat Pingkan, tetapi ternyata semua tidak berjalan dengan mudah. Pingkan merasa terganggu tatkala Johny mulai mencampuri urusan asmaranya dengan Brando (Fero Walandouw), kekasihnya, lantaran Johny merasa Brando bukan pria baik-baik. Dari situlah konflik antara ayah dan anak mulai terjadi.

programme.title: Mencari Nur Hidayah

programme.title: Seblak Empire Hentikan Ledakan Cinta
programme.desc: Secantik, Airin tetapi dia tidak malu untuk menjual seblak. Pada awalnya Rendra agak kesal kerana Airin menjual seblak, tetapi semakin lama Rendra telah jatuh cinta kepada Airin.

programme.title: Hassan
programme.desc: Hassan ialah seorang anak yatim yang tinggal bersama abang tirinya, Fuad. Tiada sesiapa yang menyukai Hassan termasuk Fuad, Jah dan kanak-kanak lain. Mereka sering memberikan layanan buruk kepada Hassan hanya kerana rupanya yang selekeh. Namun, Hassan tidak pernah ambil kisah. Pak Samad, suami kepada Jah sering mempelawa Hasan untuk menjamu makanan sedap yang dimasak oleh Jah. Malahan, Hassan juga berkawan baik dengan anak perempuan mereka, Liya. Suatu hari, Fuada terlibat dalam kemalangan kecil. Hassan telah menjaganya dengan teliti. Sejak itu, Fuad menyedari kebaikan daripada Hassan dan bukannya penampilan fizikalnya yang kurang menarik.

programme.title: Restu Ayah
programme.desc: Kisah Azlan yang terlalu dimanjakan ibu bapanya, sehinggakan sifatnya yang suka dipuji terbawa di dalam kehidupan sehariannya bersama jiran-jiran dan juga di sekolah. Kebahagiaan ini dapat dilihat di rumah dan disekolah apabila segala aktiviti serta kelakuan Azlan yang suka menuntut pujian itu disenangi oleh kawan-kawan serta guru dan ibu bapanya. Situasi ini menjadikan Azlan seorang yang sering diberi tumpuan oleh kawan-kawan, guru, jiran-jiran dan ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Milik Kita
programme.desc: Raisya gadis berkerjaya hebat, bijak dan disegani ramai. Suatu hari penghawa dingin di pejabat Raisya mengalami kerosakan, maka seorang juruteknik dihantar untuk memeriksa. Itulah detik pertama kali Raisya bertentang mata dengan Nik Luqman. Namun Rasya sedar Luqman jauh lebih muda dari dirinya. Akhirnya dengan penuh keberanian Raisya sendiri yang melamar Luqman untuk dirinya. Mereka akhirnya disatukan. Di pejabat Raisya adalah bos, di rumah dia adalah bidadari terbaik Luqman. Pejabat Raisya mengiklankan kerja kosong untuk jawatan P.A. Raisya tertarik pada seorang gadis muda, fresh graduate yang bijak, cantik dan baik. Meski masih muda, Yasmin sudahpun memiliki seoarng anak berusia 6 bulan. Raisya dan Yasmin serasi bersama dan menjadi akrab.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep13
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Hati Tak Pernah Salah
programme.desc: Bimo mempunyai seorang anak bersama Celin, tetapi Celin meninggal dunia akibat penyakit yang parah. Chika yang tidak dapat melupakan ibunya yang telah meninggal, tiba-tiba bertemu dengan Anjani yang sedang mencari pekerjaan. Ibu Bimo menawarkan Anjani untuk menjadi pengasuh Chika, tetapi Bimo tidak menyukainya. Mampukah Bimo meneruskan kehidupan demi kebahagiaan anaknya?

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep10
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep47
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep14
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep38
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Berkah Merawat Anak Yatim Yang Didapatkan Tukang Gali Kubur 15 Tahun Kemudian
programme.desc: Nada baru sahaja kehilangan neneknya, menyebabkan dia menjadi sebatangkara kerana kedua-dua orang tuanya telah lama meninggal dunia. Kerana rasa kasihan, Samsul, yang bekerja sebagai tukang gali kubur, berniat untuk mengadopsi Nada. Asma, isteri Samsul, pun menerima cadangan ini kerana mereka belum dikurniakan anak. Namun begitu, Ibu Asma menentang hasrat tersebut kerana dia ingin memiliki cucu kandung daripada anak perempuannya.

programme.title: Destiny of Us Ep21
programme.desc: Apabila Narin jatuh dari air terjun dan hilang, Nares pulang ke Thailand untuk mencari abangnya dan mengurus 'Nara Resort'. Di sana, dia bertemu Sine, cinta pertamanya yang kini menjadi pembantu Narin. Khabar angin mengatakan Sine adalah isteri rahsia Narin, mengecewakan Nares, tetapi mereka bekerjasama mencari Narin. Ketika Sine hampir terbunuh, mereka curiga kehilangan Narin mungkin dirancang. Bersama, mereka berusaha mengungkap kebenaran, membuka pintu kepada cinta yang tidak disengajakan.

programme.title: Berkah Merawat Anak Yatim Yang Didapatkan Tukang Gali Kubur 15 Tahun Kemudian
programme.desc: Nada baru sahaja kehilangan neneknya, menyebabkan dia menjadi sebatangkara kerana kedua-dua orang tuanya telah lama meninggal dunia. Kerana rasa kasihan, Samsul, yang bekerja sebagai tukang gali kubur, berniat untuk mengadopsi Nada. Asma, isteri Samsul, pun menerima cadangan ini kerana mereka belum dikurniakan anak. Namun begitu, Ibu Asma menentang hasrat tersebut kerana dia ingin memiliki cucu kandung daripada anak perempuannya.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep47
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaan. Dalam usaha menyara kedua anaknya, Salwa bekerja keras setelah ditinggalkan suaminya. Namun, keamanan keluarga kecil ini diganggu oleh peristiwa besar yang berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Akhir Derita Pencari Burung Liar Yang Berhasil Memiliki Peternakan Unggas
programme.desc: Hasil tangkapan burung liar oleh Mail dan burung rajawali goreng yang dijual oleh Imah selalu membuat Sofyan dan isterinya berasa iri hati. Sofyan dan isterinya tidak segan-segan melakukan apa sahaja untuk membahayakan Mail.

programme.title: Destiny of Us Ep23
programme.desc: Apabila Narin jatuh dari air terjun dan hilang, Nares pulang ke Thailand untuk mencari abangnya dan mengurus 'Nara Resort'. Di sana, dia bertemu Sine, cinta pertamanya yang kini menjadi pembantu Narin. Khabar angin mengatakan Sine adalah isteri rahsia Narin, mengecewakan Nares, tetapi mereka bekerjasama mencari Narin. Ketika Sine hampir terbunuh, mereka curiga kehilangan Narin mungkin dirancang. Bersama, mereka berusaha mengungkap kebenaran, membuka pintu kepada cinta yang tidak disengajakan.

programme.title: Dosen Selalu Benar Tapi Cintaku Juga Tak Pernah Salah
programme.desc: Pada hari pertama Neysa masuk kuliah dan menjalani orientasi, kakinya dilanggar motor milik Rendy di tempat parkir. Neysa terus marah kerana menganggap Rendy, yang merupakan seniornya di kampus, sengaja ingin mempermainkannya. Namun, Rendy tidak menghiraukan kata-kata Neysa. Beberapa ketika kemudian, Rendy dan Neysa bertemu lagi. Kali ini, motor mereka bertembung. Neysa kembali marah, tetapi sekali lagi, Rendy tidak mempedulikannya.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 2024 Ep12

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep141
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4963
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2247
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3889
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep225
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep224225
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep28
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep6061
programme.desc: The vibrant Chin-Lan Chang hosts a captivating journey through Taichung's cultural and creative industries, unique attractions, community initiatives, local arts, and heartfelt human stories. This show offers a rich blend of fun and learning, ensuring every moment is both enjoyable and enlightening.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep639
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep974
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep89
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, hed still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tais best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion. Award winning actor Ku Feng is his equal, playing an especially homicidal robber-chief who thinks nothing of throwing all his men at their relentless pursuer. Lu Tsun and Huang Pei-chi choreograph the many battles featuring such action stalwarts as Pai Piao and Ai Fei.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Bloody Parrot
programme.desc: A swordsman is suspected of being the thief of a treasure sent to Emperor. Through his investigation, he is led on to the trail of the supernatural Bloody Parrot. Poisonous things happen including a demonic possession, witches casting poison spells and disgusting autopsies. Then a dead constable turns into a vampire!

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Secret Service Of The Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.desc: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Raduaa
programme.desc: A faulty science experiment accidentally sends a group of friends back in time to 1955, where they must figure out how to return to the present.

programme.title: Maharathi
programme.desc: After his boss, Jai Singh, commits suicide, Subhash, a chauffeur, hatches a plan to win his insurance money. He teams up with Jai's wife, Mallika, to make the suicide look like a well-planned murder.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews several famous personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the latest movies.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
programme.desc: Milkha Singh, an Indian athlete, overcomes many agonising obstacles in order to become a world champion, Olympian and one of India's most iconic athletes.

programme.title: Made In America
programme.desc: When Zora Mathews goes searching for her biological, anonymous sperm donor father, she and her Afro-centric mother Sarah are dumbfounded to discover Hal Jackson, an obnoxious used car salesman on late-night TV; and worse than that, he's white.

programme.title: Sommersby
programme.desc: A man presumed dead shows up after six years, but he may be an imposter, and could choose to hang for murder rather than reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: The most frightened guy on Earth leads a motley crew of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: A heart breaking coming-of-age story about a boy's abusive relationship with his new stepfather, and his emotionally scarred mother.

programme.title: When A Stranger Calls
programme.desc: A high school student's babysitting job takes a nightmarish turn.

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Set against the siege of Stalingrad during World War II, this is the epic tale of a young Russian sharpshooter, Vassili, who becomes a legend when a savvy political officer makes him the hero of his propaganda campaign. Their friendship is threatened when both men fall in love with a beautiful female soldier. As the battle for the city rages, Vassili faces his ultimate challenge when the Nazi command dispatches its most elite marksman to hunt down and kill the man who has become the hope of all Russia.

programme.title: Anonymous
programme.desc: Set in the political snake-pit of Elizabethan England, ANONYMOUS speculates on an issue that has for centuries intrigued academics and brilliant minds... who was the author of the plays credited to William Shakespeare?

programme.title: Chucky S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Goin' To The Chapel - Ade due Damballa. The survivors band together with Father Bryce to perform an exorcism.

programme.title: Chucky S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Chucky Actually - Back in Hackensack for the holidays, the 3 Amigos receive a special gift; Tiffany plots her escape.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Melvin - Jack's war with his neighbor Melvin reaches a turning point when it threatens a potential date with Lynette.The school photographer increases his payment rate, so Durbin comes up with his own plan for school picture day.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Personal Everest - Jack is furious when his former high school bully is hired as a motivational speaker at Whitlock. Plus, Mary, Stef and Michelle set their own personal goals for female empowerment, accidentally causing a rift between Helen and Durbin.

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep7
programme.desc: Homeward Bound / Through The Looking Glass / Dearly Departing - "A shooting suspect kills himself in front of Officer Lori.Officer Kurt gets a call to a local home. Police Officer Stuart Winder and his partner respond to a call about an elderly woman found on her bathroom floor."

programme.title: Paranormal 911 Ep8
programme.desc: Dark Spirit / Dark Christmas / Winded - State trooper Tim Walker comes face to face with a remorseful spirit. Firefighter Bryan Meisinger finds a missing car crash victim with the help of two ghosts. A woman calls 911, reporting an intruder.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep3
programme.desc: The Stall - Charlie takes a job at a family-run Texas BBQ joint and must use her skills of perception to sniff out the truth behind a shocking death.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep4
programme.desc: Rest In Metal - Charlie goes on tour with has-been metal band Doxxxology, a motley crew of dejected rockers whove spent decades trying to write a new hit; Charlie suspects foul play when one musician winds up dead.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep5
programme.desc: Time Of The Monkey - Working at a retirement home, Charlie makes friends with two rebellious old ladies who may have taken matters into their own hands.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Joel Dommett welcomes you to his school disco. Jennifer Saunders joins the panel to try to guess who is behind the mask of Piranha, Eiffel Tower, Owl, Bubble Tea or Air Fryer.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S5 Ep5
programme.desc: Joel Dommett, Rita Ora, Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall and Mo Gilligan are joined by special guest Ellie Goulding as all eight remaining masked singers take to the stage.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12 Ep7
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12 Ep7
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Merge: A Total Crpe Shoot - The classically trained bakers go head-to-head against the remaining self-taught teams; the teams must use their detective and math skills when they compete during the elimination round; guest judge Martina McBride.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Quarterfinals: A Sticky Situation - The remaining teams of bakers continue to battle for a spot in the semifinals; in the elimination round, the teams must construct their most complicated cake yet, chosen by guest judge chef Richard Blais.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Semifinals: It's All in the Details - With only four teams of classically trained and self-taught bakers left, the semifinalists take on the safety bake round, inspired by guest judge Dwight Howard's favourite dessert.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Before Hollys husband died, he made plans for her. Over the course of the year after his death, she will receive letters, gifts, and instructions on how to be happy again.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep1
programme.desc: Pilot: Catfish - WhenHarvardphilosophyscholar Jack Griffin finds himself teaching high school inToledo, he tosses the syllabus and recruits his students to help mentally break his dream-job-stealing nemesis Miles Leonard.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep2
programme.desc: Teacher Jail - Despite his love of teacher jail where he's paid to not teach, Jack betrays the boisterous union rep who got him there in favor of Principal Durbin.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep3
programme.desc: Overachieving Virgins - While Principal Durbin struggles with budget cuts, Jack discovers his students pity him so he rallies, making a splash at the school bake sale and getting kicked out of the bookstore for life.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep4
programme.desc: Burning Miles - Jack gets into a petty dispute with Marcus, the President of Student Council, who surprisingly refuses to back down, causing the situation to escalate much too far.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep5
programme.desc: Dating Toledoans - Jack, who has been taking buses to New York to meet dates, is convinced to let Stef, Mary, and Michelle show him how to enjoy Toledo. Principal Durbin finds out that his announcements have not been as well received.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep6
programme.desc: Freakin' Enamored - When Jack is attracted to Colin's mother at a parentteacher conference, he feigns interest in her son only to have it backfire.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep7
programme.desc: Selling Out - After Jack receives an offer from Miles's publisher to write a book of feel-good philosophy, he enlists the help of Helen in hopes of using the deal as his ticket out of Toledo.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep8
programme.desc: We Don't Party - Jack finds out his ex-girlfriend needs a venue for a charity fundraiser and suggests a student's house. The kids are inspired by Jack to party for the first time.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep9
programme.desc: Rosemary's Boyfriend - Jack is incensed when his dead mom's former lover shows up and suggests they celebrate her birthday; Jack taps his students to help him retaliate, but they are busy caring for robot babies.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep10
programme.desc: Durbin Crashes - Jack takes in Durbin after giving him marriage advice that backfires and gets him kicked out of the house; the kids try to help Jack get revenge against Miles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep11
programme.desc: Eight Pigs And A Rat - The class receives a shipment of fetal pigs for dissection, but Jack cancels the dissection and fails an attempt at shooting the pigs at Miles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep12
programme.desc: Walleye - Jack successfully convinces Miles that Devin is his illegitimate son; Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle clash on the Sadie Hawkins dance theme.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep13
programme.desc: Drenching Dallas - Jack takes interest in a revenge mission on behalf of the kids; Mary, Stef and Michelle believe they've discovered an otherworldly presence.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Happiness - Jack attempts to unlock the secret of what makes ordinary people happy, leading him to an idea for a new book that he believes will be his ticket out of Whitlock High.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Nuns - As the newly minted driver's education teacher, Jack sets out to get revenge on his mother's church when he discovers the last of her money was used to buy a statue of the Virgin Mary.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Wednesday Morning, 8AM - In the hectic 30 minutes that start every day at Whitlock, Jack tries to retrieve his massage chair from Whitlock's intriguing payroll accountant, Lynette. Durbin and Helen prepare for the morning announcements.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Toledo's Top 100 - Jack is aghast to learn he didn't make the top 10 in Toledo's Top 100 Bachelors, and Durbin did. Victor and Eduardo decide it's time to reveal their feelings to their crushes.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep5
programme.desc: J'Accuse - Jack tries to impress Lynette using Michelle's annual murder mystery party as a distraction. Plus, desperate students break into Whitlock High to steal the AP biology practice exams.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Melvin - Jack's war with his neighbor Melvin reaches a turning point when it threatens a potential date with Lynette.The school photographer increases his payment rate, so Durbin comes up with his own plan for school picture day.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Personal Everest - Jack is furious when his former high school bully is hired as a motivational speaker at Whitlock. Plus, Mary, Stef and Michelle set their own personal goals for female empowerment, accidentally causing a rift between Helen and Durbin.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Sweet Low Road - When budget cuts threaten to gut Whitlock and put his job in jeopardy, Jack recruits Mary, Stef and Michelle to take down the superintendent. Durbin plans an appeal to the heart, while the students appeal to the soul.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dr. Whoopsie - When an embarrassing video of him falling off a stage goes viral, Jack plans a viral video of his own. Plus, Durbin, Helen and the teachers hunt down Whitlock's most notorious litterer known as The Sugar Daddy.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Handcuffed - When he's kicked off his Harvard phone plan, Jack is offered a chance to leapfrog onto Mary's on one condition, he must help her break up with her scuzzy boyfriend. Anthony becomes Durbin's right-hand man.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Spectacle - When his computer breaks, Jack rallies his class to win the annual Whitlock's Got Talent competition so he can use the prize money for a new laptop.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Ride The Ram - It's the most exciting time of the year for Durbin's Birthday and Spirit Week. Jack does his best to steer clear of any school spirit as everyone else comes together to take down their hated rivals at Prairie High.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Kinda Sorta - Sarika has an offer for Jack when the university fair comes to Whitlock, get her into Harvard and she'll get his book to her publisher aunt. Plus Stef prepares for a visit from a fling, while Helen applies to university.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Tiny Problems - When Jack is disappointed with the popcorn maker he orders, he and the students plot revenge; Helen goes back to school to get her high school degree and chaos ensues in Principal Durbin's office in her absence.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Disgraced - Mr. Pugh plans a field trip for the Toledo chapter of the Ohio Naturalists; when Jack can't write his own book, he agrees to be ghostwrite for popular author Robin Shwank -- only to insert his own chapters into Shwank's book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Gary Meets Dave - Jack accidentally loses a significant amount of money and it falls in the hands of the students; as Principal Durbin and Helen investigate who stole the money, the students and teachers admit to other wrongdoings.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Get Hoppy - Principle Durbin turns into a power-hungry maniac after self-publishing Jack's philosophy book.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mr. Pistachio - Jack has Mary drive him to the doctor, but a prank results in him getting the same procedure twice; at school, Durbin and Helen embarrass themselves and the kids compete over class superlative titles.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep6
programme.desc: That That That - As the school prepares for winter break, Jack tries to record a lecture as a way into the University of Wisconsin's philosophy department; frustrated and unable to finish the video, he falls asleep and has nightmares.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Aces Wild - Helen has a vaping problem to overcome with the help of Durbin while Anthony's secret is revealed.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Katie Holmes Day - While the rest of the town prepares for the celebration of Toledo's annual Katie Holmes Day, Jack and Marissa plot to ruin the holiday pageant.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Tornado! - A tornado puts the school on lockdown and Helen believes it's coming specifically for her. The kids pass the time by writing fan fiction, "shipping" various combinations of faculty members.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweatpants - Jack has the students form a fake cult to sabotage Principal Durbin's new school uniforms. Mary, Stef and Michelle prepare to see one of their favorite artists who is in town to perform.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep3
programme.desc: An Oath To Rusty - Jack attempts to get closer with the guys at work by inviting them over for a game night. Helen helps Principal Durbin grow a backbone. Stef and Mary try to coax information out of Michelle about a court case.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Tons Of Rue - When the A.P. Bio students reunite Jack with his deadbeat dad, Jack plots revenge by trying to expose his allegedly reformed father. A witch foretells of a grim future for Mary, Stef and Michelle that divides the women.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep5
programme.desc: The Perfect Date From Hell - When Jack discovers his new girlfriend's therapy homework requires dating him, he turns the tables on her. Principal Durbin goes undercover to determine which faculty member is most worthy of a very special prize.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Love, For Lack Of A Better Term - Victor attempts to catch up to his peers and become a man by sending Ashlanda a risqu photo. Grace and Anthony try to "Parent Trap" Mary and Principal Durbin after overhearing a conversation on single adults.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Malachi - When Jack's girlfriend says she's going to dinner with a male friend, a jealous Jack tags along. Principal Durbin, Mary, Stef and Michelle take Helen out to cheer her up after a breakup.

programme.title: A.P. Bio S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Harvard Pen - Jack is enraged to find that the A.P. Bio students have stolen his beloved Harvard pen after he asked them not to touch it. Principal Durbin and Helen repeatedly fail the superintendent's inspections.

programme.desc: Three trailblazing women, Ruby Wax, Mel B and Emily Atack, retrace the famous footsteps of intrepid Victorian explorer Isabella Bird through the Rocky Mountains of Colorado.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Summer Ep2
programme.desc: Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how winters arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: Animals that were once near extinction find refuge in the safety of zoos. Celebrate the birth of red pandas, twin snow leopard cubs, a southern white rhino, and a Sulawesi macaque, all species that are endangered in the wild.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Creepiest Crawlies Ep5
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip Ep4
